subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby scored twice and Dany Sabourin made 20 saves to record his first shutout as the visiting Pittsburgh Penguins defeated the Devils last night, 5-0.
snippet: Sidney Crosby scored twice and Dany Sabourin made 20 saves to record his first shutout as the visiting Pittsburgh Penguins defeated the Devils last night, 5-0.
